Articles.Content:
Hi there, i'm new to the forum so hello to y'all .

I've been following the development of KSP and the mods since KSP 0.17.

As KSP has developed trough the years into a real game, i have finally purchased the game today.

I give the developers of the game a thumbs up for making and developing the game and also to all the modders,

as they make the game a more extensive "big fun to play-game" and add a lot more to the game to make it real fun and addictive.

Favorite mods like: KW, NP, Mechjeb, Engineer Redux, KJR, DMagic Orbital Science, EVE, Scansat, FAR, and many more are the ones that make the game for me.

i like the way the users of KSP keep in touch with the modders, to polish the mods into cool useable and unmissable add-ons.

So hello again, and you will find me on the forums from now on:confused:

Immediately i have a first question:

I still have to find out how to add an avatar and if possible a signature to my profile (i have no option to add one) so hopefully there are some users that can give me a little hand so i can provide my profile with one:D.

Hi Aluminator!

Great to see you in the community!

For myself, I also really love the KSP community and the developers, BUT

Don't use MechJeb.

Even though this is my personal opinion, MechJeb will make you less expierienced in the game and it takes away a big challenge.

Try to live without it, learn how to control your spacecrafts like a boss. (I am Anti-Mod in general, but MechJeb is a real fauxpas I believe)

I can help you with your profile picture, just write me a PM.

Hello Alluminator and welcome to the forum.

Right now, the forum software is not entirely convinced that you're not a sneaky spambot, so you can't customize your profile. But after you post a few more times, the software believes you about the whole being human thing, and you will automatically be granted full member status.
Hi welcome and I'm also new I joined on the4th of july

@Vanamonde

OK i didn't know that. Thank you very much for the info !!!! I will keep posting and give my opinions about mods and stuff and maybe some help to others in the future .

Edited July 28, 2014 by Aluminator
